SELECT
up.id_uprivada, up.id_uinmobiliaria, up.numeracion, up.tipo_unidad, CONCAT_WS(" ", p.nombre,p.primer_apellido) nombre_propietario, IFNULL((SELECT sum(d.monto) total_monto FROM cuota c INNER JOIN detalle d ON c.id_cuota = d.id_cuota GROUP BY c.id_uprivada HAVING c.id_uprivada = up.id_uprivada ),0) - IFNULL((SELECT sum(a.monto_abono) total_abonado FROM cuota c INNER JOIN abono a ON c.id_cuota = a.id_cuota WHERE a.validado = 1 GROUP BY c.id_uprivada HAVING c.id_uprivada = up.id_uprivada),0) monto_total FROM unidadprivada up INNER JOIN persona_up pup ON up.id_uprivada= pup.id_uprivada AND pup.id_tipo_relacion = 1 INNER JOIN persona p ON pup.id_persona = p.id_persona ORDER BY up.id_uinmobiliaria, up.id_uprivada

SELECT
up.id_uprivada, up.id_uinmobiliaria, up.numeracion, up.tipo_unidad, CONCAT_WS(" ", p.nombre,p.primer_apellido) nombre_propietario, IFNULL((SELECT sum(d.monto) total_monto FROM cuota c INNER JOIN detalle d ON c.id_cuota = d.id_cuota GROUP BY c.id_uprivada HAVING c.id_uprivada = up.id_uprivada ),0) - IFNULL((SELECT sum(a.monto_abono) total_abonado FROM cuota c INNER JOIN abono a ON c.id_cuota = a.id_cuota WHERE a.validado = 1 GROUP BY c.id_uprivada HAVING c.id_uprivada = up.id_uprivada),0) as monto_total FROM unidadprivada up INNER JOIN persona_up pup ON up.id_uprivada= pup.id_uprivada AND pup.id_tipo_relacion = 1 INNER JOIN persona p ON pup.id_persona = p.id_persona WHERE up.id_uprivada = #{id}
